

!ACL-IPV4-MATRIZ

ip access-list extended acl-ipv4-SALA-01
  permit ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.60.250
  permit ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.10.254
  permit ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.10.253
  permit ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.10.252
  permit ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.10.1  
  permit ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.10.2
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 172.16.110.0 0.0.0.255  
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 10.16.110.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  permit ip any any
int vlan 10
ip access-group acl-ipv4-SALA-01 in
ex

ip access-list extended acl-ipv4-SALA-02
  permit ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.60.250
  permit ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.20.254
  permit ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.20.253
  permit ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.20.252
  permit ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.20.1  
  permit ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.20.2
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 172.16.110.0 0.0.0.255  
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 10.16.110.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  permit ip any any
int vlan 20
ip access-group acl-ipv4-SALA-02 in
ex

ip access-list extended acl-ipv4-SALA-03
  permit ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.60.250
  permit ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.30.254
  permit ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.30.253
  permit ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.30.252
  permit ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.30.1  
  permit ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.30.2
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 172.16.110.0 0.0.0.255  
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 10.16.110.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  permit ip any any
int vlan 30
ip access-group acl-ipv4-SALA-03 in
ex

ip access-list extended acl-ipv4-SALA-04
  permit ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.60.250
  permit ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.40.254
  permit ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.40.253
  permit ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.40.252
  permit ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.40.1  
  permit ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.40.2
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 172.16.110.0 0.0.0.255  
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 10.16.110.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  permit ip any any
int vlan 40
ip access-group acl-ipv4-SALA-04 in
ex

ip access-list extended acl-ipv4-SALA-05
  permit ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.60.250
  permit ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.50.254
  permit ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.50.253
  permit ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.50.252
  permit ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.50.1  
  permit ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.50.2
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 172.16.110.0 0.0.0.255  
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 10.16.110.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  permit ip any any
int vlan 50
ip access-group acl-ipv4-SALA-05 in
ex

ip access-list extended acl-ipv4-WIFI
  permit ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.60.250
  permit ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.70.254
  permit ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.70.253
  permit ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.70.252
  permit ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.70.1  
  permit ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 host 192.168.70.2
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 172.16.110.0 0.0.0.255  
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 10.16.110.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  permit ip any any
int vlan 70
ip access-group acl-ipv4-WIFI in
ex

ip access-list extended acl-ipv4-SUPORTE
  permit ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  permit ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  permit ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.99.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 172.16.110.0 0.0.0.255  
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 192.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 10.16.110.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.10.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.20.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.30.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.40.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.50.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.60.0 0.0.0.255
  deny ip 192.168.99.0 0.0.0.255 10.168.70.0 0.0.0.255
  permit ip any any
int vlan 99
ip access-group acl-ipv4-SUPORTE in
